faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Frequently Asked Questions about our website and how it works to help you find the best flight deals.
faq.question1: What is the purpose of this website?
faq.answer1: This website is a tool to help you find the best price for your next flight. It is not a travel agency, it is a search engine that compares prices from hundreds of airlines and online travel agencies, to help you find the cheapest flights.
faq.answer2: We search for flight prices on many different travel websites, from national airlines, low cost airlines, online travel agencies and traditional travel agencies. We compare the prices and show you the best deals we find.
faq.question3: How can I book a flight?
faq.answer3: We are not a travel agency, so we do not sell tickets. When you find a flight you like, click on "View Deal" and you will be redirected to the travel agency or airline's website where you can book your flight.
faq.answer4: You can contact us by email
